channel.title: Matt1203 a new guy PLZ HELP
channel.description:
i need help with DL'ing the webclient 3.2 or sum crap with the new stuff iv seen but i registered today n stuff and i get an error trying to run it like
cannot find external/internal source please press any key to continue
then on the webclient 3.2 connect page it says loading java applet
need some help plz :confused: :confused: :confused:

item.title: Matt1203 a new guy PLZ HELP
item.dc:creator: @matt1203 matt1203
item.description:
@matt1203 wrote:

[quote=“Newbi, post:4, topic:25137”][quote author=matt1203 link=topic=37924.msg456785#msg456785 date=1163488649]

[quote author=MoparScape Poster link=topic=37924.msg456722#msg456722 date=1163488243]

http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,8825.0.html <<<

Hope that link will help you, setting up a server is a challange.

but first you need to get into moparscape correctly :D.

If you want to go on someone else’s server go to the big section called SERVER ADVERTISEMENT

There are other people’s servers that you can log into.

-Newbi

  • MoparScape Poster
    [/quote] i DL’ed that crap but still i dont want my OWN server i wanna play some1 else’s and im to lazy to make 1

iv made a WoW one and making ur own server in all games is hard imho but im just a newbie so yeah still need help
[/quote][/quote]point of that link was?

Read full topic
item.source: Matt1203 a new guy PLZ HELP
